articles.author: Ariane de Vogue, CNN Supreme Court Reporter
articles.title: Supreme Court puts execution of Texas man on hold in dispute over pastor's access - CNN
articles.description: The Supreme Court granted a request Wednesday from a Texas death row inmate who sought to block his execution because the Texas Department of Criminal Justice will not allow the inmate's pastor to "lay hands" on him and audibly pray during the execution.
